reviewText: Stumbled on this one in VHS at a garage sale, and couldn't be happier.  True, it doesn't have top notch production, but the kids are thoroughly engaged with the positive message (the answer to "Why not pick on someone smaller than you?").  I'm getting it in DVD so that it will last.
On time and just as expected!
Great movie. My daughter loved it and so did I when I watched as a child.
Love this old movie! cute film, I remembered it from when I was little. Some minor adult themes but good morals are present throughout. And I love the cat Sissy haha
Great movie.
I loved this movie as a kid, thought my son would, too.
Thrilled to find this on DVD.  I have an old video of this story that my grandchild loved 30 years ago.
AAAAAA+++++

Teaches valuable lessons with realistic problems and relationships. . GREAT movie for children & adults. Christian based that all children can use as a learning tool.. My children have enjoyed this film for YEARS now it's time for their children to enjoy as well!  Looking forward to this new generation and see how it encourages their behavior and respect for all
I love this movie and watch it over and over again.  Highly recommended for all ages.
my grandson love thsi movie,he is 12.i got it for him when he was 3.he lost his vhs one.thank u.so much.it's his 12th birthday present.
Absolutely wonderful movie for all ages.
Watched rhis move as a child, now I've passed it on to my kid... :-)
Cutest movie ever.

I just about cried when I found this. My dad used to play this movie for my brother and I when we were children and now that I am grown up and my dad has had more children I gave it to him to make new memories with my younger siblings. Needless to say he loved it. I got exactly what I paid for. Thank you.

great kids movie, A classic. the quality of the video for the one I got was rather poor.

Over all I would not recommend this Item, poor quality video.
This was the best thing ever! Thank you!
My kids loved this movie growing up and now my Granddaughter loves it also.
WONDERFUL FAMILY MOVIE THAT TEACHES THE YOUNG HOW TO TREAT PEOPLE
Given that this was a Christmas gift, I can only say that my son was thrilled to get this for a gift.

This movie was good at first until you cannot play the ending because it would not work for some reason. Amazon is really good with fixing a defective item but this company that they went through takes a long time to try and fix the problem. I am still waiting to get in touch with the seller.
picture and quality are great, love the movie and so does my son.  Older cartoons contain so many more life lessons than the cartoons now.
Good Movie. Older Movie I Grew Up Watching And Loved It. Would Recommend For Any Smaller Kid & Mom Or Dad Looking For Movies To Watch This Is The One && Very Kid Friendly.
This is such a great movie. I loved it 18 yrs ago when my kids where little and love watching it just as much with my grand kids. Thank you so much for having it for us to get..

Watched this movie last night with my 5 year old daughter. She loved it as much as I did at her age. The movie is just the way I recall and still sends such a great message. I love Amazon and being able to find older movie for cheap so I can share them with my daughter. Thank you for sending this DVD fast!
This movie is great for teaching several life skills.  Friendship, responsibility, empathy and honesty are just a few of the topics the movies explores.
I have been looking for this movie for years! Its a great movie and had no scratches on it, watch this movie it teaches kids great lessons.

There is nothing wrong with the film or story, but this DVD has horrible sound quality. You can hardly hear the characters' dialogue over the music and the volume is very strange. I saw another customer reporting the same problem.
It overall was a good copy ! It  came exactly when it was suppose too. I have never ordered stuff online and it all went well
My grandkids loved this movie and watched it over and over again. Got if for my nieces and nephews this year.

I watched this movie as a kid growing up so for me it's just full of nostalgic scenes. It's not the most captivating movie re-watching it, and it's dubbed... but for a child I still think it's a great movie.
I got this for my little bro. He likes it a lot. I was happy with the price and condition. Cute christian values wrapped up in a sweet little sparrow. Good for the little ones.

I vaguely remembered this movie from my childhood, and couldn't wait to get hold of it again! I actually bought it used, since the new prices were more than I wanted to spend. The DVD played perfectly, and the case was in great condition. It brought back memories of when I was little, watching this with my siblings. Wonderful movie for children, it teaches valuable lessons by way of an action-packed cartoon. It keeps creativity alive by portraying a magical transformation of a boy into a bird, but includes realistic problems and relationships. I will definitely be sharing this movie with my children in the future!
This is one of my favorite childhood movies and it was great to watch it again!!! The DVD worked very well. Thanks!
I love this movie! I watched it when I was younger, and I still love to watch it even though I am older. This is definitely a great movie to watch with your family, especially with the children.
I've always like this movie and since I've showed it to my grandson he likes it too. We had a discussion about the movie. It's good to know how he could talk about willy the gardian lady.
I gave this a five star rating because it was a litle hard to find elsewhere, and it arrive quickly(within a few days).It was given as a gift.

I got this for my daughters bday and she couldn't believe I had found it. She remembers n loves this movie as a child, and now an expecting mom she wants to share this with her child....Ty for having this in stock.

Recently bought this Dvd. I know this movie is old, but the quality on this copy is Horrible! The music overpowers the voices and you can hardly hear them, and that's with the TV on Max Volume. It changes volume all throughout the movie and goes from loud to soft throughout the entire film. I'm not sure if this is just my copy or others also.
The graphics definitely tell the age of this movie but my daughter remembered this movie from when she was young and wanted to share it with my granddaughter...I have to say they both loved it!

What this film lacks in technology...it more than makes up for in just about every other area.  It's a film my boys and I have enjoyed for over 9 years and we have shared it with many friends and family.  In our opinion it is one of the best family films made.  Appropriate and enjoyable for all ages.
Such a great story!  My son loves this movie!
Memories. <3
Such a great movie and lessons to learn for toddler and kids alike!
Great condition my son was very happy
I remember watching this on HBO or Showtime as a kid, and I wanted my nieces and nephews to see this as well. Two thumbs up!
Perfect quality, looks like it maybe saw a dvd player once (I bought it used). A-mazing movie.
I would highly recommend this movie because it's a good children's movie for those who are 10 and under.
I watched this movie as a child and was excited to purchase it for my daughter. I bought a used disc that was said to work but did not. Pretty disappointed..

I show this movie to my first graders every year and they absolutely love it!! You can hear a pin drop while they watch.  A beautiful message of kindness, the importance of education (knowledge), and friendship! Great movie with invaluable lessons for all!
Wonderful video.  Appreciated by toddler.  Willy the Sparrow is sweet and meaningful.
